metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4092 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions starting from 15.6 before 15.6.1. It was possible to create a malicious README page due to improper neutralisation of user supplied input.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
